phrases: The first characters from the words for truth
Name: Maki Father: Gouda Yutaka Mother: Yuriko Eldest Daughter
Is her hair still sticking up?
Yeah, she looks like a Saiyan.
Yeah, she is growing really fast, so you should come soon.
I am looking forward to seeing her.
Name: Maki Father: Gouda Yutaka Mother: Yuriko Eldest Daughter
Do you know what month this is?
In February, there is something known as Valentine's Day.
It is the day girls give boys they like chocolate.
You should watch where you are going.
I wonder what kind of chocolate Yamato-san will give you.
You think she will give me chocolate?
What is this, a banzai pose?
I have never gotten real chocolates from a girl.
I have gotten obligation chocolates, but...
Back in my younger days, plenty of kids were like you.
You are so generous every year.
Every year, I think I will not get any,
but I still wonder if I might.
And then, I am always let down.
So far, that is how Valentine's Day has gone for me.
I think Yamato-san will give you something really amazing.
Well, I have never gotten chocolate from a girl who liked me before.
You mean a girl who really likes you.
A girl who really likes me!
Oops, if I set my expectations too high,
I will just act like it is not a big deal.
Though, you are doing a banzai pose.
So, this year, I will actually get chocolate from a girl who likes me?
Wait, I was thinking of having our second kiss on Valentine's.
Get my chocolate, say thank you, then...
Please teach me how to make chocolate.
It is for Valentine's Day, right?
I have never made anything sweet in my life,
and I do not even have the equipment.
Why not make it together, at my place?
I am making something for Takeo-kun, anyway.
Having a boyfriend must be nice.
They look like they are having fun.
We do not have anything planned.
We want to make some for ourselves, too.
Okay, let us all make chocolate at my place, on the 13th.
Then we will buy the ingredients.
Just now, you were my shield.
I do not really have much cash on me today.
Let us just buy something to drink at the food court, and chat.
Is she low on cash because of Valentine's Day?
Yamato, you do not have to try so hard.
I am fine, as long as I get something.
She actually, did not say anything specific.
Oh, I was just about to ask if you were free.
I will go throw these away.
I have to be careful not to pressure her.
so there are lots of limited-edition chocolates on sale!
Oh, right, Valentine's is coming up.
The limited-edition chocolates are really something.
They come in beautiful colors and shapes.
It costs that much for this little?
I bet they use really good cacao beans or something.
This year, I have seen pistachios a lot.
I do not need anything expensive.
I wonder if that is trendy right now.
You can even give me chocolate that did not turn out okay.
Can we hang out with Yamato-san's friends on February 14th?
We have never gotten chocolates on Valentine's Day!
I only remember one, in kindergarten,
when the mom of a girl who rode the same bus gave me one!
At least you got some once!
I do not want to be sitting at home, alone,
wondering if I will get some this year!
Nanako's saying she will give me some that is handmade.
Man, and I do not like sweet stuff.
I just feel like I am going to be all alone again this year...
Are not you guys over-relying on Takeo?
He was not able to spend Christmas alone with his girlfriend, either.
You should just let this go.
I can get chocolate from Yamato.
On Valentine's Day, Takeo-kun's friends want to have fun with all of us.
Not like we have a date or someone we are after.
Then why not give the chocolates we make on the 13th to the boys?
I will be doing my own thing with Osamu.
He was doing back extensions out the window,
and fell out when he tried to open a new message.
Takeo, I am glad you are okay!
Well, it went like that, and I was fine.
But next time, please grip my legs firmly.
No, I mean we are okay for Valentine's.
Yamato Rinko Subject: It is Okay Can we decide the location?
Valentine Chocolate Sweets to Make Your Loved One Melt-in-Your-Mouth Chocolate Panna Cotta
Hey, how long do I have to keep stirring this?
Nanako, maybe you are not cut out for this.
I cannot believe you did not know how to separate egg whites.
I am surprised you would consider trying handmade chocolate.
Well, I wanted to show off for Osamu.
If others do it for me, there is no point.
Yeah, I think that is good.
Let us spread it and cut shapes.
It is pretty fun when you know you are giving it to a guy.
Do you have anyone in mind?
Well, do you think they will like getting chocolates from us?
I wonder how it feels, getting chocolate from a girl you do not really like.
Maybe they will think it is creepy that it is handmade.
Takeo-kun and I will not let that happen!
Yeah, Rinko will get mad at them!
In kindergarten, there was some chocolate in Suna's bike basket...
To: Sunakawa-kun I do not need chocolates in return, so please like me.
There was a letter and everything.
I remember thinking, It must be from a girl who likes him...
For this year's Valentine's Day, love is in the air.
It is your turn to give love, Sis.
It is a good day to get chocolate.
It is not too cold or too hot,
so the chocolate will not melt.
You are stacking your hopes way too high.
What do you do with all that?
If there are names on any, I just return the favor on White Day.
Well, I cannot really imagine a situation where it would go any further than that.
I guess some people start dating when they click.
Unlike you, I have never clicked with any girl.
I remember him saying it was a bother before.
He said girls talked behind my back, too.
I got a text saying they are already here.
Hey, since it is Valentine's Day,
C-Can you give them out so that it is like one person's giving them to another?
Yeah, not like you are just distributing...
Well, I know how they feel.
When I get home, I am going to brag to my parents.
I am glad we made them.
They are even talking about their parents.
Takeo-kun, you should not eat that in the restaurant.
It is to thank you for what you did.
I guess they have given this a lot of thought, too.
That is not what I meant!
I cannot let Yamato guess how much I am looking forward to the chocolate.
Is the chocolate in her bag?
Is something wrong with my bag?
You are scooping up all the chocolate!
I am having so much fun,
it is hard to hide my excitement.
Dude, you are not hiding it at all.
What do you want to do next?
It will be my very first chocolate from a girl who likes me!
I was really happy we got chocolate, too!
Um, can we hang out, even if Takeo and Yamato-san are not coming?
Okay, let us swap contact info, then.
Oh, I am in a bit of a hurry today.
Takeo, you cannot go through there.
Takeo, that is the wrong way.
Maybe, if you are already dating, you do not bother giving each other chocolates?
She is always giving me things.
Maybe this time, there is not anything.
Izumi-san's granny said this is for you because it is Valentine's.
When you see her, thank her.
Maki, your brother could not get any chocolate from the girl he likes.
I guess it just might be how things are...
Is something wrong with my bag?
I should have just asked her to give me some.
It is my fault for not telling her I was really looking forward to it.
She was so casual about it,
I did not realize she was giving me chocolate!
She must have made it the same as the rest, so no one would feel awkward.
My very first chocolate from a girl who likes me and I did not savor it!
Try to remember what it tasted like!
I did not realize she was giving me chocolate,
so I did not thank her properly!
I bet they use really good cacao beans or something.
I want to get Yamato limited-edition chocolates!
Come with me to the department store!
I am coming down right now!
Sure, but it is already closed, so we should wait till tomorrow.
Oh, thank goodness you are here, Takeo-kun.
I was not sure how I would get the doorbell.
Here is your Valentine's Day chocolate.
It was so big, I had to figure out the box.
Since it is Valentine's, I wanted to make something really special.
I got in over my head,
so I made a lot of mistakes.
I have never messed up tempering chocolate, even in elementary school.
I decorated it in a big hurry just now.
I was not sure I would get it done in time today,
but I am glad I did.
But you gave me chocolate earlier.
No, that was just a group thing.
She is taking a bath with her daddy now.
I will come to hold her soon.
I am really glad I got to give this to you today.
Thank you for giving me chocolate.
Thank you for falling in love with me.
My very first chocolate from a girl who likes me!
Master, here is my obligation chocolate.
Here, you can have one, too, Sunakawa.
I think she was being considerate by waiting till the day after.
I think everyone who falls for you is a nice person.
All the girls who ever asked Suna out
had been talking about me behind my back.
And that is why he turned them all down.
But there must have been someone who was not doing that
I do not need chocolates in return, so please like me.
among the girls who gave him chocolate.
Next time: The Letter and Me.
